name: Frayed
description:
5250 x 5250 png

I've begun to teach myself the art of digital 3D alongside my tangible oil paintings and this is the first in an exploration of a style that it seems I'm edging to; my love of J-Horror sits beside high contrast b+w and the preference of horror of the psyche - the quotidian fear that injects itself into our ordinary and everyday - over the American scare tactic of shock-jump then laughter 

although this is the first 3D piece I've created in this style, it's the second overall 3D piece that I've created with the first (a contemporary re-imagining of Munch's 'The Scream') released on FDN: https://foundation.app/@smartpopartist/the-scream-59587
